TopicTitle: Help me name this once and for all!

Articles.Content:
The Saturn K is my try at doing it like the saturn rocket of the apollo program.

i have tried to keep myself to the actual rocket's staging, and I think it worked out pretty fine. There are ofcourse a few issues with it: -I put a gigantor on the orbital module, I'm guessing that's not really realistic...

- The lander is not in two parts, although I might add that later

She has 400+ parts, so low framerate is to be expected. and the obliteration of the first stage when decoupling it is perfectly normal

Here are some pictures:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I hope you like it, and leave a comment if you have some notes or anything.

Craft file: https://www./?ytaq1tlb5vo22t5

Edited February 20, 2014 by panzerknoef

That's a fantastic looking rocket!

Thank you sir!

And btw, I've nearly completed the new lander design! It has 2 stages, and there's gonna be a little rover inside!

Okay I've decided to take this to a new level, perhaps somewhat mulbin style (although I can never achieve his level of details) I am gonna keep working on this rocket, releasing new versions once every so often (2.0 is due this week-end). But I'm also not trying to compete with the amazing MunBug, Sure I want to give people an alternative but I'm not gonna go full replica style for now. This is just my Apollo-style rocket, working as a saturn V and so on, but not exactly the same. I could never replicate the LM, my abitilty to go in detail like that just isn't there, but I will replace those things by own design that function in a similar way!

Hope this works, but first of all! We need a new name, and that's where you guys come in. I am here and now requesting the community to help me name this rocket once and for all! Thanks in advance!

Panzerknoef
